channel.title: CiTR -- The Barn Burner
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: The greasy side of rock n' roll, rhythm n' blues, and country. Crack a beer, order some bbq and get your boogy on.

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Oct-2011
item.description: I Love you CiTR! I Love You Vancouver! I Love YOU Barn Burner listener! Keep It Ragged, Keep It Real, and Stay Greasy...
item.itunes:subtitle: Last Barn Burner Ever!!!!

item.title: Barn Burner20-Oct-2011
item.description: My first run of the Barn Burner is sadly coming to an end at CITR. I'm going out with a bang though... Jack Oblivian, John Paul Keith, Lucinda Williams and The Drive By Truckers are just a few of the folks featured on this second last installment!
item.itunes:subtitle: Second last show!

item.title: Barn Burner 29-Sep-2011
item.description: AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH.... Oh yeah, and the new Blitzen Trapper is reaaaaally good.
item.itunes:subtitle: Socan....

item.title: Barn Burner 15-Sep-2011
item.description: We were often inseparable - we had some times. Here's a heavy set reminiscent of the times you supported me while rocking out. Hellacopters, C'mon, Graveyard, Pentagram, New Pack AD among others...
item.itunes:subtitle: RIP: Converse Weapons purchased in 2004

item.title: Barn Burner 08-Sep-2011
item.description: Cheeseburger, The Byrds, Los Lobos, The Backsliders... and the mooninites make an appearance. Must remember to keep the cue button pressed ha ha...
item.itunes:subtitle: Keepin' The Summer a' rockin...

item.title: Barn Burner 25-Aug-2011
item.description: Man that Deep Purple track is so money. Had some spider bags, the heavy, supersuckers and Eddie Floyd happenin too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Flight of the Rat...

item.title: Barn Burner18-Aug-2011
item.description: T Rex, Thin Lizzy, Slade, Cheap Trick, Kiss, Young Heart Attack, Urge Overkill, Tricky Woo...well, you get the picture.
item.itunes:subtitle: Biggest....Big Dumb Loud & Catchy Guitar Set....Ever.

item.title: Blood On The Saddle 14-Aug-2011
item.description: Subbing in for Dan for the Month of August! Very excited to get my Honkey Tonk on for alternating Sundays. My first set list was a blast! Lefty Frizzell, Los Lobos, Doug Sahm, Blackie and the Rodeo Kings, Steve Earle and much, much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bobby Badger hops on the Saddle!

item.title: Barn Burner 04-Aug-2011
item.description: Great interview with Brian Venable from Lucero today!
item.itunes:subtitle: Brian Venable from Lucero

item.title: Barn Burner21-Jul-2011
item.description: A great interview from a member of one of my favourite Vancouver bands. Aaaaand.... Freddy Fender, Waylon, The Brought Low, Buffalo Killers, Duane Eddy, The Wicked Pickett, Young Jessie and much more...
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris Kinnon from Lions In The Street

item.title: Barn Burner 14-Jul-2011
item.description: Bobby Hackney from Rough Francis was on the show today - great interview and he threw down a great playlist for the Barn Burner!
item.itunes:subtitle: Rough Francis Interview

item.title: Barn Burner 01-Jul-2011
item.description: Yeah...I went for it. The cliched Canada rock n roll show, but you love it...
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Canada Day!

item.title: Barn Burner17-Jun-2011
item.description: Don't worry; I'll keep you posted. I'll be gone next week but tune in for a pre-record!
item.itunes:subtitle: Might be moving to Thursdays!

item.title: Barn Burner10-Jun-2011
item.description: Standells, MC5, SRB, Dead Moon and much more... and I don't think 'Anarchic' is a word, but I used it anyway...
item.itunes:subtitle: Good Garage-y stuff

item.title: Barn Burner 03-Jun-2011
item.description: Is awesome! Oh yeah and I totally diss the Eagles. Staple Singers, O.V. Wright, Stone The Crows, James Gang, Buffalo Tom, a new band called 'Waters' etc.
item.itunes:subtitle: New White Denim Album...

item.title: Barn Burner 27-May-2011
item.description: Like I said...rockin out till they throw me out- The Crossfires, The Backsliders, Hank Ballard, Those Darlins, the Sheepdogs etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Dem ol' CiTR restructuring blues...

item.title: Barn Burner 20-May-2011
item.description: Crazy start-John Holt and the Wingless Angels! Proof that Jamaica and the Barn Burner can 'burn one down'...
item.itunes:subtitle: Reggae's roots? Greasy...

item.title: Barn Burner13-May-2011
item.description: Lot's of Voodoo in this one, including some classics from Smiley Lewis, Bo Diddley, and Albert King. Relative new bloods C'mon, The Hot Blood Bombers and Miesha and the Spanks get their mojo workin' too...
item.itunes:subtitle: Friday the 13th: A Rock n Roll Symbology Show

item.title: Barn Burner 06-May-2011
item.description: I suggest that you go back and re-visit Black and Blue by the Stones if you already own it...
item.itunes:subtitle: Black Angels Tickets give-away and more!

item.title: Barn Burner29-Apr-2011
item.description: In-Studio Performances with Pool Hall Gospel and We Hunt Buffalo!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: 24 Hours of Live Thunderbird Radio Hell!

item.title: Barn Burner 22-Apr-2011
item.description: What a great show and what a performance! Thanks to Luke and Evan that helped make everything run smoothly. Honky Tonk radio at its finest...
item.itunes:subtitle: Cowpuncher and Brooke Wylie live in-studio!!

item.title: Barn Burner 15-Apr-2011
item.description: I'll make sure I rectify that on air next week! Gave away some Black Angels tickets and all-in-all a fun show...heavy on the blues tip.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Penetrators are from Syracuse N.Y. not Detroit!!!

item.title: Barn Burner 08-Apr-2011
item.description: How can you go wrong starting a show with a name like that? Lots of requests today. AWESOME!! Keep listening! If you ask for Tricky Woo, Tight Bros From Way Back When, and the Saints, I will play 'em!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tiny Topsy...

item.title: Barn Burner 01-Apr-2011
item.description: On You: Nickleback ha ha don't worry never again. On Me: My show CD didn't burn ha ha don't worry never again.
item.itunes:subtitle: April Fools!

item.title: Barn Burner 25-Mar-2011
item.description: Quite a diverse line-up today...but all bad ass. Status Quo even makes an appearance...
item.itunes:subtitle: Black Joe Lewis is the bomb

item.title: Barn Burner 11-Mar-2011
item.description: I INTERVIEWED PATTERSON HOOD FIVE MINUTES AFTER MY SHOW WAS SUPPOSED TO END. That alone should get you to listen to this podcast. Oh yeah-DBT, Black Joe Lewis,Charles Bradley, Miesha and the Spanks, and Grand Champeen on the show too...
item.itunes:subtitle: Patterson Hood

item.title: Barn Burner 04-Mar-2011
item.description: Good mix of stuff today... happy anytime I get to play Larry Williams. Love new District Attorneys and Kurt Vile! Haven't played punk rock in awhile! Solid Dead Boys/Sham 69 ending...
item.itunes:subtitle: Early start...

item.title: Barn Burner 11-Feb-2011
item.description: I'm mean, what SHOULD you tell people when they ask you what you play? That's a little inside so you should listen to the podcast to find out what I'm babbling about. You should also listen to the podcast because i played Louie and the Lovers, John Wesley Coleman, the new Eddie Spaghetti and a whole lot more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Centre or Harmonica?

item.title: Barn Burner 28-Jan-2011
item.description: DBT doc 'Secret To A Happy Ending' Director Barr Weismann and DBT poster and album artist Wes Freed called in for a chat! Also-Esquerita, Screamin Joe Neil, and Social D too!
item.itunes:subtitle: DBT Extravaganza!!

item.title: Barn Burner21-Jan-2011
item.description: My ol' buddy Rodney Decroo showed up for the usual madness and managed to slag off Ian Tyson and Anne Murray in less than 5 minutes- ha ha gotta love that Rodney! Music choices? Vintage Sam Cooke, Sir Doug and the Texas Tornadoes, and Freddy Eaglesmith to name a few...
item.itunes:subtitle: Anniversary Show!

item.title: Barn Burner 14-Jan-2011
item.description:
January 29th, 2011 @ Chapel Arts- be there!! Tonnes of Great music and other rowdy things to do. DBT Movie Giveaway!
New Social D today, also- WH Walker, Guadacanal Diary, The Black, Steve Marriott, Iron City House Rockers, DBT and much more...
item.itunes:subtitle: 1st Annual Barn Burner!!

item.title: Barn Burner 07-Jan-2011
item.description:
Gotta date for the FIRST ANNUAL BARNBURNER: VANCOUVER'S GREASY ROCK N ROLL, RHYTHM & BLUES, AND COUNTRY REVUE. JANUARY 29TH, 2011.
Shiloh Lindsey, Big Sugar, Junior Kimbrough, Endless Boogie amongst others today...
item.itunes:subtitle: First show of '11!

item.title: Blood On The Saddle19-Dec-2010
item.description: Thanks Dan for letting me get my boots dirty! Fred Eaglesmith, Billy Joe Shaver, Hank III, Haunted Hearts, DBT, Bocephus, Wactasha, and much much more...
item.itunes:subtitle: Filling in for Dan...

item.title: Barnburner 03-Dec-2010
item.description: Started off the show with some earth shaking boogie gospel w/ the reverend Charlie Jackson. Got some new stuff in there too with Lions in The Street and Rich Hope. Cow Puncher may be my new heroes...
item.itunes:subtitle: Testify!!

item.title: Barnburner 26-Nov-2010
item.description: Back from Maui and thoroughly refreshed! Bass-less show featuring Flat Duo Jets, Pack AD, The Sights, The Revelators, JSBX, R.L. Burnside etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Bass-less Show

item.title: Barnburner 05-Nov-2010
item.description: Apparently Hawaiians go gaga over it. Wow the Strokes made it on the show today! Michiganites Whitey Morgan and Melvin Davis also make appearances and New Orleans Legend Eddie Bo..
item.itunes:subtitle: Spam...

item.title: Barnburner 22-Oct-2010
item.description: That's amazing. Gonna see J. Roddy Walston tonight! Let's rock...
item.itunes:subtitle: Charlie Louvin is still making records?

item.title: Barnburner 15-Oct-2010
item.description: Balls out Rock Trio from T.O. shows ya how it's done! Muchos Rawkos today!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Flash Lightnin!

item.title: Barnburner 08-Oct-2010
item.description: And it was all greasy- new Steve Adamyk was definitely a highlight. And who new that 'the voice' could throw down like that? Go on you mad Welshman... A little Sir Doug and Secret Sisters to boot...
item.itunes:subtitle: We boogied, we honky-tonked, and we rocked...

item.title: Barnburner 01-Oct-2010
item.description: No one does the Blue Eyed Soul as convincingly as Penn and Oldham do. Some good Rhythm and Blues this week from the likes of Mavis Staples, Rufus Thomas, and the Five Du-Tones. A Peter Green request and some great greasy rock from the Brought Low.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dan Penn is who Rod Stewart wanted to be.

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Sep-2010
item.description: Great new rock n' roll tracks this week-Grinderman, Urge Overkill, and C'mon! Got the C & W covered with Tammy Wynette and a Hoyt Axton request for my mom. And too start things off, an R & B shaker with Black Joe Lewis...BOBBY BOOSHAY! Oh ya, and a great live performance from Toronto's own, Great Bloomers!
item.itunes:subtitle: Great Bloomers=Great Folks!

item.title: Barnburner 17-Sep-2010
item.description: cd three didn't work, turntable 1 didn't cue up.... ah well can't win 'em all. BTW Happy Birthday Carrie Lynn! I hope you liked your Dexateens/GBV dedication. Also had some Ike and Tina Goodness in there, and my new favourite honky tonk sensation, Caleb Klauder!
item.itunes:subtitle: Everything went haywire!

item.title: Barnburner10-Sep-2010
item.description: No one can claim that I don't offer the Rock n Roll variety!! Welcome back to class UBC!
item.itunes:subtitle: Eamon McGrath to Leaf Hound

item.title: Barnburner 03-Sep-2010
item.description: Wow...what a great time and what an album he's written. It's the Barnburner in overdrive as Rodney and I ramble and rock until 3:30pm!
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest Rodney Decroo!!

item.title: barnburner 20-Aug-2010
item.description: Capoera? Sorry about the slam, Brazil ha ha... Good segue for a solid global heavy handed rock n roll opening though... Some Rodney Decroo and Carolyn Mark in there as well...
item.itunes:subtitle: global hard rock...

item.title: Barnburner 13-Aug-2010
item.description: A lotta bands with 'Black' in the name. I gave away Hold Steady tickets and Cam from Radio Zero discusses the practice of 'Caning'. Ahh it's good to be back...
item.itunes:subtitle: Friday the 13th

item.title: Barnburner 06-Aug-2010
item.description: while the Badger's away, the Bryce will play some J.Geils Band, Jeff Beck Group, some vintage R&B from the Pinetoppers, Rex Garvin & Champion Jack Dupree, current rockabilly ravers from Tandoori Knights & Rosie Flores, some revved-up Supersuckers, 9 LB Hammer and a classic from the Long Ryders!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bryce fills in!

item.title: Barnburner30-Jul-2010
item.description: This one was really all over the board... Hank and Wanda, Tom Waits and Deadboy and Elephantmen, Warlocks and Hellacopters...something for everybody!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hank Ballard kicks off show...or was that Harold?

item.title: Barnburner 16-Jul-2010
item.description: And I'm married! First phone interview-Miesha and The Spanks! Lots a good rock n roll... and a band called Barnburner!! Theme song here I come...
item.itunes:subtitle: I'm Ba-aaaack!

item.title: Barnburner18-Jun-2010
item.description: Blue Shadows got re-released...cool! Rodney Decroo, Hank III and The Joey Only Outlaw Band keep it a fairly Honky Tonk affair... Hot Live Guys rock out though!
item.itunes:subtitle: Merle for my Mom!

item.title: Barnburner 11-Jun-2010
item.description: JOAN JETT IS NOT A LESBIAN! She's AC/DC...just like the song says...c'mon just let me have this. Oh yeah and a crazy good track from Witch... the Zambian garage band! Awesome. Other good stuff like Detroit featuring Mitch Ryder, MC5, Flamin' Groovies etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Zam-Rock and my future ex-wife...

item.title: Barnburner 04-Jun-2010
item.description: Those suns a bitches... whirlwind of fuck ups and rock n roll armageddon. Billy Thorpe and the Aztecs make it all worthwhile with their Rawk Power.....
item.itunes:subtitle: Who changed myspace on me?

item.title: Barnburner 28-May-2010
item.description: Some spaghetti western stuff (Spindrift, Sadies)...Quadrajets,Dexateens,Lazy Cowgirls, New Black Keys etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Zed Zed Top give away...

item.title: Barnburner 21-May-2010
item.description: RIP Ronnie James Dio. Stones and Stooges Re-releases... and Weller's new one is pretty friggin' rockin!
item.itunes:subtitle: Re-releases and a death in the family...

item.title: Barnburner14-May-2010
item.description: When you start a set off with 'I'm The Man' by Patto... it's nuthin but aces on a sunny Friday, baby! Howlin' Rain, Endless Boogie, Woojden Ships, Cream, etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Hypnotic boogie time! Soo much fun...

item.title: Barnburner 07-May-2010
item.description:
Geordie and Slade? How that git in the rotation bin? couple of technical difficulties but...hey...my unpredictable technical glitches went part and parcel with my totally sporatic playlist....
Cheeseburger, Bellrays, Unnatural Helpers, The Soft Pack, Hayes Carll, Black Angels, Canteen Knockout etc.
item.itunes:subtitle: Glam-tastic

item.title: Barnburner30-Apr-2010
item.description: The Strange Boys, Deer Tick, The Gourds and Titus Andronicus being somewhat vulgar...
item.itunes:subtitle: Lots of fun greasiness

item.title: Barn Burner 23-Apr-2010
item.description: Alright...these themed shows have had a good run so here's what CITR's playlist has to offer! Mark Sultan, Roky Erickson, Dum Dum Girls, Pack AD, Stolen Minks, Spoon River, The Whigs, Canteen Knockout.... Rolltide!
item.itunes:subtitle: New Music That The Kids Love...

item.title: Barnburner16-Apr-2010
item.description: The Creators! The Architects! The Bad-Asses! Chuck, Bo Diddley, Little Richard, Johnny Burnette, Esquirita, Eddie Cochrane, Wanda Jackson... and my boy Link Wray just to name a few. Canadian new guys Devils Hotrod and the Rumble Devils make an appearance too....
item.itunes:subtitle: If you could call Rock n' Roll another name, it might be Chuck Berry...

item.title: Barnburner on 09-Apr-2010
item.description: Burnside, Kimbrough, and McDowell....that ol' chesnutt...basically the best stuff...ever.
item.itunes:subtitle: Da Blues!

item.title: Barnburner 26-Mar-2010
item.description: Geez it's about time... DBT, Southern Bitch, Waylon, Tompall, Skynyrd, Duane Allman... NINE POUND HAMMER AND MOLLY HATCHET? This set actually smells like sour mash...
item.itunes:subtitle: The Southern Thang...

item.title: Barnburner19-Mar-2010
item.description: Len Price 3, Graham Day, The Gruesomes, Jim Jones Review, The Heavy, Heavy Trash...whaddya know...2 Heavies!
item.itunes:subtitle: Garage-y madness!

item.title: Barnburner 12-Mar-2010
item.description: Buffalo, AKKA DAKKA, The Saints, Scientists, The Drones... oh yeah and a little BRMC, Minto and We Hunt Buffalo from Kanata as well...
item.itunes:subtitle: Thunda from Down Unda!!!

item.title: Barnburner26-Feb-2010
item.description: Ah yes the motor city... John Lee Hooker,David Ruffin, Mitch Ryder, The MC5, The Stooges, Hank Ballard and much much more...
item.itunes:subtitle: Detroit Tribute Show!!

item.title: Barnburner 19-Feb-2010
item.description: And I hate losing stuff, probably more than anything... Buddy Miles, Rich Hope, Diamond Nights etc., etc.
item.itunes:subtitle: I HATE skipping CDs...

item.title: Barnburner 12-Feb-2010
item.description: Deadstring Bros., Little Fish, Dexateens, New DBT Track, James Carr, Thin Lizzy etc. etc.
item.itunes:subtitle: Those Little Donuts, Soren Kierkkegaard, and a lotta Bloodshot records....

item.title: The Barn Burner Eps. 3 05-Feb-2010
item.description: Rose Tattoo, White Cowbell Oklahoma, Wilson Pickett, Corb Lund etc. etc...
item.itunes:subtitle: Switchin' it up a bit and gettin the rock out early... bit of a turntable mishap later in the show hee hee... a whip crackin' time none the less!

item.title: The Barn Burner29-Jan-2010
item.description: Lotsa rock, lotsa roll, lotsa Hank,and lotsa soul!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Greasier Side of Rock n' Roll, Rhythm n' Blues, and Country

item.title: The Barnburner
item.description: The greasier side of Rock n' Roll, Rhythm n' Blues, and Country. Eddie Floyd, Black Joe Lewis, King Khan and BBQ, Sir Douglas Quintet, Waylon Jennings, Corb Lund, Carolyn Mark and NQ Arbuckle, Sun Wizard, Spider Bags, Devils Hot Rod, The Revelators, Cheeseburger, Social Distortion, Endless Boogie, Jack 0 and The Tearjerkers, Heavy Trash, The Reigning Sound, The Detroit Cobras...
item.itunes:subtitle: First Episode!! January 22, 2010
